messages.delimitersMustBeDifferent: Delimiters for fields and field values must be different.

File invalid. Only CSV is allowed.
exceptions.Wrong file. The file does not match the: Wrong file. The file does not match the template
exceptions.Count of file rows is less than one: Count of file rows is less than one

types.simple: Import Feed type, intended for importing values into any TreoCore entity
types.product: Import Feed type that allows you to configure the import of values into the product entity, taking into account the values of the product's main fields, product attribute values, and product-related images, with the ability to associate a specific column of the imported file with the corresponding field pertaining to the product, its attribute and / or image relating to the product
types.productImage: Import Feed type, providing the ability to import product images with image binding to a specific channel. For importing, the import file must have a column sku, columns with images should be named according to the channel code to which this image will relate, in the case of the omission of the corresponding channel or the channel code does not match the column name, the image will be imported from the Scope channel, but without selecting a channel. For Global Scope, the column name should be Global
